headers.value: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' https://cdn.jsdelivr.net https://maps.googleapis.com https://maps.gstatic.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://cdn.jsdelivr.net https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com https://fonts.googleapis.com; font-src 'self' https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com https://fonts.gstatic.com; img-src 'self' data: https://novaterraadm.vercel.app https://maps.gstatic.com https://maps.googleapis.com; frame-src https://www.google.com https://maps.google.com;
